unnormalised: Boro, tor tumi Indian rastyanchi uttam ritin sondhpachi vat vichartat, hã? Kamar kas, bhai! Tem dhyepekshem anubhavachem mahatv zait asa. Gambhirpanan vichar korunk gelear, Bharatan driving korop hem vostavik jivit video game-ant bhag ghetelea bhoxen zata, punn gunn meulea bodlek tumka maronnche anubhav yetat. NH48-chea modhyant chill korpi avara gai hanchea pasun auto-rickshaw-an bus-ancher kombde marop hanchea poriant sab tumka mellta. Ani pottleacher survat dita mhonnuch naka – te attam itihasik chinhache asat.
normalised: Bore, tumi Bharoti rosteak koshe somore veche mhunon vicharta? Tyaar rav, bhai! Tem dhyea pachi dhavan nistana asta, pun tem anubhavachi visha mhun jevona asta. Khoreponani, Bharotat dakhona mhunje tumi eka khorya jeevna viddyio gemat bhag gheta, pun tem punkt pachi, tumaka mrutyuche lagich anubhav milta. Tumi N-H chalis athyacho madhyat rogovali gayi dilli disti, auto-rickshaw basa sode chicken khelti. Ani potholyanchi sangnuki koronk bhi naka - te eka itihasachi pratima asta mhunn tanko.

unnormalised: Poilem, driving school-ant shikhloli vostu visor zai. Suraksheche driving chavi asat, punn offensive honking itlemuch mahatvachem asa. Horn tumcho uttam ixtt, tumcho therapist, tumchea sangpaccho marg "Hanv hanga asa, sambhallunk zai!" Toxench, ek uttam dashcam-ant invest kara; tumka puravo zai poddtoch tumi 5-marganchea intersection-acher konnak marg dakhoinchochem vixayecher ek vat-vivad bhettolea uprant. Smoron dovortat ki 60 kmph-achi speed limit ek vinamr suchovna zatam ek kotthin niyamanchea bodlek.
normalised: Pahile, tumi drive kashok shiklulem tem visrun taka. Samrakshanchi drive mukhya asta, pun gunavadi honking bhi ekach mukhyacha asata. Honk tumacho sodo dost, tumacho therapista, tumacho vakan asata "Hanv hya assa, somoronk tumaka!" Ekuch dhashcamat gunvanuk koronk tumchi garaj asta; tumaka pramanik goroz asa tumi vadhikari sadankache panch margiche vishayant konak prava asa mhunn tumacho sadankacho krodh distalo (tumi samza: konak bhi asa). Sada sadhichi sixty kilometer pachi gativishvaasa asa mhunn tem apmanaichem vichar asa pun teka thodok hukum asa.

unnormalised: Attam, vixex vichar korunk zau di. Zoxem Delhi-chea pasun Jaipur-cher road trip-chi yojna astana, kitem tori ghoddunk toyar rava. Tumka ek unt-gaddi traffic-achea marghanant mellunk xakta, ek laginanchi mirvonnuk highway-chi addai korunk xakta, va bakreamcho zund thoddea velan yetolo. Udok, khavpak vastu (khas korun biscuit – Parle G tumcho rakhonnkar) ani eke uttam vinodi bhavna hamesha sangata ghevnk zai. Suttecher vetoch tyre-cher pressure check kor (32 PSI-cher lakx div). Offline maps download kara kiteak thoddea margancher internet connectivat 1998-chea dial-up-chea bhaxen kharab asta.
normalised: Atam, amkam vishishtak sodonk. Tumi Delhi kadon Jaipurak yatrakarache vichar kortale mhunn tumi kanchik bhi tyaar ravunk. Tumi camel cartacho yatrakaracho astavalo distalo, eka lagna yatrakaracho marg dakhavnako, va bakryanchi vikhadi dhavadik disti. Sodeyaka udok, snacks (sadi biscut - Parle G tumacho rakhondar), ani eka bore bhavenik sangodaka taka. Tumchi tyre pressure chodd kork - (tis purn don P-S-I taka) tumi davank soronk pohilim. Offline mep bhi dawnload taka karan ekach margicho internet ek hazar nau she ainanavitiche phalan kadon kharab asa.

unnormalised: Nimannem, xant ravon dhondgalak apnava. Bharatan driving korop hem fokot marg A-chea pasun marg B-cher vochonk nhoi; punn tem margan mellchea addventuranchea vixayan asa. Dhirya, xakt ani nirman samasyanche uttor sodhpa-chea kalachea crash course-chea rupan tem vichar kor (pun intended). Ani borem, tumi fail zalear, fokot chai ani samosa khatir parkink kara. Tem jivitachea 99% samasya uttorta, traffic-chea samasya sangatam. Surakshechi bhonvddi, ani traffic-che dev tumchea vixayan astole!
normalised: Shevatak, shant rav ani avyavashta sangat haka yad taka. Bharotat dakhona mhunje fakt A kadon B dakhonachi asta; tem margicho adventure mhunn chodd asa. Tem thambhi vichar koronk (punni vichar kortolo) dhairya, utsah, ani utpadhan vichariche shikona asa. Ani hey, tumka hakadicho marg dakhonak zata mhunn ekuch chai ani samosa pachi thambunk. Tem nauvanu sadanka jivnachi samasya sodunk zata, sadanka yatrakaracho avartanik bhi. Dhairya yatra taka, ani yatra devtache tumcho pakshat asta!
